name: Elegoo Centauri Carbon 2 0.4 nozzle
change_filament_gcode:
;========== CC&CC2 - Filament Change==========
;===== date: 2025-09-20-002 =====================
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=MACHINE_MODEL B=CC
SET_CONDITION_END
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=PRINT_TOOL B=[next_extruder]
COMP M204 S10000
COMP G1 Z{min(max_layer_z+3, printable_height+0.5)} F1200
COMP G92 E0
COMP G1 E-[old_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
COMP M400
COMP M106 S80
{if old_filament_temp > 142 && next_extruder < 255}
COMP M104 S[old_filament_temp]
{endif}
T[next_extruder]
CANVAS_SWITCH_FILAMENT T=[next_extruder]
COMP M400
COMP G92 E0
{if flush_length_1 > 1}
; FLUSH_START
; always use highest temperature to flush
COMP M400
M2202 set_filament_type:UNKNOWN
COMP M104 S[nozzle_temperature_range_high]
COMP M106 S80
{if flush_length_1 > 23.7}
COMP G1 E23.7 F{old_filament_e_feedrate} ; do not need pulsatile flushing for start part
COMP G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{old_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
{else}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_1} F{old_filament_e_feedrate}
{endif}
; FLUSH_END
COMP G1 E-[old_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
COMP G1 E[old_retract_length_toolchange] F300
COMP M400
M2202 set_filament_type:{filament_type[next_extruder]}
{endif}
{if flush_length_1 > 45 && flush_length_2 > 1}
; WIPE
COMP M400
COMP G1 X56 F10000
COMP M106 S200
COMP G4 P3000
COMP M204 S18999
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
COMP M400
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
COMP M400
COMP G1 X64 F8000
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
;G1 X64
;G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP G1 X52 Y245 F10000
COMP G1 Y264 F3000
COMP M400
COMP M106 S80
{endif}
{if flush_length_2 > 1}
COMP M106 S80
; FLUSH_START
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
COMP G1 E-[new_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
COMP G1 E[new_retract_length_toolchange] F300
{endif}

{if flush_length_2 > 45 && flush_length_3 > 1}
; WIPE
COMP M400
COMP G1 X56 F10000
COMP M106 S200
COMP G4 P3000
COMP M204 S18999
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
COMP M400
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
COMP M400
COMP G1 X64 F8000
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
;G1 X64
;G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP G1 X52 Y245 F10000
COMP G1 Y264 F3000
COMP M400
COMP M106 S80
{endif}
{if flush_length_3 > 1}
COMP M106 S80
; FLUSH_START
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
COMP G1 E-[new_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
COMP G1 E[new_retract_length_toolchange] F300
{endif}
{if flush_length_3 > 45 && flush_length_4 > 1}
; WIPE
COMP M400
COMP G1 X56 F10000
COMP M106 S200
COMP G4 P3000
COMP M204 S18999
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
COMP M400
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
COMP M400
COMP G1 X64 F8000
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
;G1 X64
;G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP G1 X52 Y245 F10000
COMP G1 Y264 F3000
COMP M400
COMP M106 S80
{endif}
{if flush_length_4 > 1}
COMP M106 S80
; FLUSH_START
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
COMP G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
{endif}
COMP M400
COMP M106 S200
COMP G1 X54 F10000
COMP M109 S[new_filament_temp]
COMP G1 E6 F{new_filament_e_feedrate} ;Compensate for filament spillage during waiting temperature
COMP M400
COMP G92 E0
; WIPE
COMP M400
COMP G1 X56 F10000
COMP M106 S200
COMP G4 P3000
COMP M204 S18999
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7} F10000
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7} F10000
COMP M400
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7} F10000
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7} F10000
COMP M400
COMP G1 X64 F8000
COMP G1 X80 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7}
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7}
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7}
COMP G1 X52 Y245 F10000
COMP G1 Y264 F3000
COMP M400
COMP M106 S80
{if layer_z <= (initial_layer_print_height + 0.001)}
COMP M204 S[initial_layer_acceleration]
{else}
COMP M204 S[default_acceleration]
{endif}
SET_CONDITION_END B=[next_extruder]
machine_end_gcode:
;===== CC&CC2 - END Gcode ================
;===== date: 2025-09-20-002 =====================
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=MACHINE_MODEL B=CC
M400 ; wait for buffer to clear
M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
M106 S255 ;Cooling nozzle
M83
G92 E0 ; zero the extruder
G2 I1 J0 Z{max_layer_z+0.5} E-1 F3000 ; lower z a little
G90
{if max_layer_z > 100}G1 Z{min(max_layer_z+50, printable_height+0.5)} F20000{else}G1 Z100 F20000 {endif}; Move print head up 
M204 S5000
M400
M83
G1 X202 F20000
M400
G1 Y250 F20000
G1 Y264.5 F1200
M400
G92 E0
M104 S0 ;Turn-off hotend
M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
M106 S0 ; turn off fan
M106 P2 S0 ; turn off remote part cooling fan
M106 P3 S0 ; turn off chamber cooling fan
M84 ;Disable all steppers
SET_CONDITION_END
COMP M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
COMP M106 S255 ;Cooling nozzle
COMP M83
COMP G92 E0 ; zero the extruder
COMP G1 E-0.8 F1800
COMP G2 I0 J1 Z{max_layer_z+0.5} E-0.5 F3000 ; lower z a little
COMP M106 S50
COMP M106 P2 S0
COMP G90
{if max_layer_z > 75}COMP G1 Z{min(max_layer_z+5, printable_height+0.5)} F20000{else}COMP G1 Z80 F20000 {endif}; Move print head up 
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=ENABLE_CANVAS B=1
COMP M400
PRINTER_UNLOAD_FILAMENT
COMP M400
SET_CONDITION_END
COMP M204 S5000
COMP M82
COMP G1 X52 Y245 F20000
COMP G1 Y264 F3000
COMP G92 E0
COMP M400
COMP M104 S0 ;Turn-off hotend
COMP M400
COMP M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
COMP M400
COMP M106 S0 ; turn off fan
COMP M400
COMP M106 P2 S0
COMP M400
COMP M106 P3 S0
COMP M400
COMP M84 ;Disable all steppers
COMP M400
COMP SET_GCODE_OFFSET BED_ROUGHNESS=0.0
COMP M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=0
COMP BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default
SET_CONDITION_END
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=1
COMP BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default1
SET_CONDITION_END
COMP M400
machine_start_gcode:
;===== CC&CC2 - Start Gcode ================
;===== date: 2025-09-20-002 =====================
; slice_cfg_model: 1
;LAYER_COUNT:[total_layer_count]
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=MACHINE_MODEL B=CC
;printer_model:[printer_model]
;initial_filament:{filament_type[initial_extruder]}
;curr_bed_type:{curr_bed_type}
;bed_level_temp:[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
M400 ; wait for buffer to clear
M220 S100 ;Set the feed speed to 100%
M221 S100 ;Set the flow rate to 100%
M104 S140
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
G90
BED_MESH_CLEAR
G28 ;home
; Always pass `ADAPTIVE_MARGIN=0` because Orca has already handled `adaptive_bed_mesh_margin` internally
; Make sure to set ADAPTIVE to 0 otherwise Klipper will use it's own adaptive bed mesh logic
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE mesh_min={adaptive_bed_mesh_min[0]},{adaptive_bed_mesh_min[1]} mesh_max={adaptive_bed_mesh_max[0]},{adaptive_bed_mesh_max[1]} ALGORITHM=[bed_mesh_algo] PROBE_COUNT={bed_mesh_probe_count[0]},{bed_mesh_probe_count[1]} ADAPTIVE=0 ADAPTIVE_MARGIN=0
M729 ;Clean Nozzle
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
;=============turn on fans to prevent PLA jamming=================
{if filament_type[initial_no_support_extruder]=="PLA"}
    {if (bed_temperature[initial_no_support_extruder] >50)||(bed_temperature_initial_layer[initial_no_support_extruder] >50)}
    M106 P3 S255
    {elsif (bed_temperature[initial_no_support_extruder] >45)||(bed_temperature_initial_layer[initial_no_support_extruder] >45)}
    M106 P3 S180
    {endif};Prevent PLA from jamming
{endif}
;enable_pressure_advance:{enable_pressure_advance[initial_extruder]}
;This value is called if pressure advance is enabled
{if enable_pressure_advance[initial_extruder] == "true"}
SET_PRESSURE_ADVANCE ADVANCE=[pressure_advance] ;
M400
{endif}
M204 S{min(20000,max(1000,outer_wall_acceleration))} ;Call exterior wall print acceleration
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5} Y-1.2 F20000
G1 Z0.3 F900
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]
M83
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 F{min(6000, max(900, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/0.5/0.3*60))} 
G1 X-1.2 E10.156 ;Draw the first line
G1 Y98.8 E7.934
G1 X-0.5 Y100 E0.1
G1 Y-0.3 E7.934
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-50} E6.284
G1 F{0.2*min(12000, max(1200, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/0.5/0.3*60))} 
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-30} E2
G1 F{min(12000, max(1200, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/0.5/0.3*60))} 
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-10} E2
G1 F{0.2*min(12000, max(1200, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/0.5/0.3*60))} 
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5+10} E2
G1 F{min(12000, max(1200, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/0.5/0.3*60))} 
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5+30} E2
G1 F{min(12000, max(1200, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]/0.5/0.3*60))} 
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5+50} E2
;End PA test.
G3 I-1 J0 Z0.6 F1200.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 F20000
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
SET_CONDITION_END

COMP G90
COMP M106 S0
COMP M106 P2 S0
COMP M106 P3 S0
COMP M104 S200
COMP M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
COMP G28 X Y
COMP G1 X52 Y245 F20000
COMP G1 Y264 F3000
COMP M204 S10000
COMP G1 X52 Y250 F12000
COMP G1 Y264 F3000
COMP M109 S200
COMP M106 S200
COMP M109 S180
COMP M104 S140
COMP G1 X80 F8000
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80
COMP M106 S100
COMP BED_MESH_CLEAR
COMP G28 Z I128 J255 K0.1 L4
COMP M106 S200
COMP G1 X128 Y261 Z1 F600
COMP G2 Z0 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 Z-0.6 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 X130 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 X132 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 X134 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G1 F600
COMP G1 X120
COMP G1 X136
COMP G1 X120
COMP G1 X136
COMP G1 X120
COMP G3 X122 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G3 X124 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G3 X126 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G3 X128 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G3 Z0.2 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G1 Z10 F600
COMP G1 X80 Y250 F12000
COMP G1 Y264 F3000
COMP G1 X64 F15000
COMP G1 X80
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80
COMP G1 X128 Y261 F15000
COMP G1 Z0.2 F600
COMP G2 Z0 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 Z-0.6 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 X130 I-0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 X132 I-0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 X134 I-0.6 J0 F600
COMP G1 F600
COMP G1 X120
COMP G1 X136
COMP G1 X120
COMP G1 X128
COMP M109 S140
COMP M106 S0
COMP M400
COMP G2 Z0 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G2 Z0.6 I0.6 J0 F600
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP G1 Z10 F3000
COMP G1 Z10.15 F3000
COMP M400
COMP M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] A
COMP M106 S0
COMP G1 X20 Y20 F20000
COMP G28
COMP M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=0
COMP M400
COMP SET_GCODE_OFFSET BED_ROUGHNESS=-0.06 MOVE=1 MOVE_SPEED=1
COMP M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_DATEA B=0
COMP BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=default MESH_MIN=10,10 MESH_MAX=243,246 PROBE_COUNT=8,8 ALGORITHM=BICUBIC FROM_SLICER=2
COMP M400
COMP SAVE_CONFIG
COMP M400
COMP G28 Z
SET_CONDITION_END
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=1
COMP M400
COMP SET_GCODE_OFFSET BED_ROUGHNESS=-0.015 MOVE=1 MOVE_SPEED=1
COMP M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_DATEB B=0
COMP BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=default1 MESH_MIN=10,10 MESH_MAX=243,246 PROBE_COUNT=8,8 ALGORITHM=BICUBIC FROM_SLICER=2
COMP M400
COMP SAVE_CONFIG
COMP M400
COMP G28 Z
SET_CONDITION_END
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=PRINT_CALIBRATE B=1
{if (max(3,first_layer_print_size[0]/29) > 6) or (max(3,first_layer_print_size[1]/29) >= 6) }
COMP BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=A MESH_MIN={max(first_layer_print_min[0]-10,10)},{max(first_layer_print_min[1]-10,10)} MESH_MAX={min(243,first_layer_print_min[0]+first_layer_print_size[0]+10)},{min(246,first_layer_print_min[1]+first_layer_print_size[1]+10)} PROBE_COUNT={max(4,round(first_layer_print_size[0])/29)},{max(4,round(first_layer_print_size[1])/29)}  ALGORITHM=BICUBIC FROM_SLICER=1
{else}
COMP BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=A MESH_MIN={max(first_layer_print_min[0]-10,10)},{max(first_layer_print_min[1]-10,10)} MESH_MAX={min(243,first_layer_print_min[0]+first_layer_print_size[0]+10)},{min(246,first_layer_print_min[1]+first_layer_print_size[1]+10)} PROBE_COUNT={max(3,round(first_layer_print_size[0])/29)},{max(3,round(first_layer_print_size[1])/29)}  ALGORITHM=LAGRANGE FROM_SLICER=1
{endif}
COMP M400
COMP SAVE_CONFIG
COMP M400
COMP G28 Z
SET_CONDITION_END
COMP M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=0
COMP BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default
SET_CONDITION_END
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=1
COMP BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default1
SET_CONDITION_END
COMP M400
COMP M204 S{min(20000,max(1000,outer_wall_acceleration))} ;Call exterior wall print acceleration
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=PRINT_TOOL B=[initial_no_support_extruder]
COMP G1 X52 Y245 F10000
COMP G1 Y264 F1000
COMP M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]
COMP M106 S50
COMP M400
T[initial_no_support_extruder] 
CANVAS_SWITCH_FILAMENT T=[initial_no_support_extruder]
COMP M400
COMP G1 E8.5 F360
COMP G1 E1.5 F50
COMP G1 E8.5 F360
COMP G1 E1.5 F50
COMP G1 E8.5 F360
COMP G1 E1.5 F50
COMP G1 E8.5 F360
COMP G1 E1.5 F50
COMP G1 E8.5 F360
COMP G1 E1.5 F50
COMP G1 E8.5 F360
COMP G1 E1.5 F50
COMP G1 E8.5 F360
COMP G1 E1.5 F50
COMP G1 E8.5 F360
COMP G1 E1.5 F50
COMP G1 E-2 F1800
COMP M106 S200
COMP G4 P5000
COMP M204 S18000
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1 F10000
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1 F10000
COMP M400
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1 F10000
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1 F10000
COMP M400
COMP G1 Y261.1 E-0.1 F10000
COMP G1 Y264.1 E-0.1 F10000
COMP M400
COMP G1 X64 F8000
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP G1 X64
COMP G1 X80 E-0.1
COMP M106 S0
SET_CONDITION_END B=[initial_no_support_extruder]
COMP G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-1} Y-1.2 F20000
COMP G1 Z0.5 F900
COMP M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]
COMP M83
COMP G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
COMP G1 E6 F{min(1200, max(120, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]*60/2/2.5043))} 
COMP M106 S200
COMP G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-41} E20 F{min(12000, max(1200, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]*60/2/2.5043))} 
COMP G1 F6000
COMP G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-46} E0.8
COMP M106 S0
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=PRINT_CALIBRATE B=1 
COMP BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=A FROM_SLICER=1
SET_CONDITION_END
COMP G1 F20000
COMP G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
;LAYER:0
